architectural_notes: Add an administrative wipe/reset operation that clears all persistent Maps/collections and resets ID counters; ensure it is properly access-controlled and safe to run (ideally one-time or restricted).
known_issues: Previous attempt to build/deploy the wipe function failed ("AI was unable to complete your request"), requiring a retry.

new_feature_requests.summary: Implement a wipe/reset function to clear all stored database data (profiles, tasks, logs/history, avatars, preferences) and reset counters
Add a backend-only administrative wipe/reset operation that clears all stored application data and resets all ID counters so the canister returns to a fresh state.

Update backend user registration/profile-creation logic so that when there are zero stored user profiles (e.g., immediately after a wipe/reset), the first user who creates/completes a profile is automatically assigned the Manager role; all subsequent users default to Assistant role unless explicitly changed by existing logic.

Ensure canister upgrades remain safe after adding the wipe/reset mechanism and first-user manager assignment by adding/adjusting conditional migration logic in the backend migration file so upgraded deployments do not trap and state remains consistent.

projectName: Implement backend wipe/reset operation and first-user manager assignment
